title: 🏦 Commercial Bank Banking Trainee Job – 2025
description:
BOC trainee staff assistant video : https://youtu.be/RDbhgq0WBjk

link to apply : https://www.combank.lk/careers

Looking to start a career in banking? 🚀
Commercial Bank of Ceylon PLC is now accepting applications for Banking Trainee jobs for 2025. This is a golden opportunity for students who have completed GCE O/L, A/L, or professional qualifications like AAT, CIMA, ACCA, IABF to enter the banking sector in Sri Lanka.

🎓 Eligibility Criteria:
✔️ Age: 18–24 years
✔️ GCE O/L with minimum 4Cs (including Maths) and A/B in English
✔️ GCE A/L with 3 simple passes
✔️ Recognized professional qualifications also accepted


#CommercialBank #BankingTrainee #KKAcademySL #SriLankaJobs #BankJobs2025 #TraineeVacancies #NoExperienceJobs #SriLankaBankJobs #HowToApply #careerinbanking

description:
Sinhala Explora

📜 Commercial Bank Millionaire Investment Plan

💰 Commercial Bank Millionaire Investment Plan – Build Your Wealth in Sri Lanka 🇱🇰

Looking to achieve your financial goals with a structured savings plan? The Commercial Bank Millionaire Investment Plan offers a flexible and secure way to accumulate wealth over time. In this video, we delve into the features, benefits, and how you can start your journey toward financial success.

📌 Key Features:

- Flexible Investment Periods: Choose from 2 to 6 years, allowing you to plan according to your financial goals.

- Targeted Savings: Set your savings goal starting from Rs. 500,000, with options to save in multiples of Rs. 500,000.

- Attractive Interest Rates: Enjoy competitive interest rates, with recent revisions reflecting up to 15% per annum, enabling you to reach your savings milestones faster.

- Loan Facility: Access up to 75% of your accumulated balance as a loan for urgent financial needs during the investment period. [2]

- Nominee Option: Ensure your savings are secured for your loved ones by appointing a nominee to receive the total amount invested in the event of your demise before maturity.

 
📈 Monthly Deposit Examples:

To achieve a target of Rs. 1 million:

- 2 Years: Rs. 35,600 per month

- 4 Years: Rs. 18,100 per month

- 6 Years: Rs. 11,225 per month 

These structured plans make it easier to manage your savings and reach your financial objectives.

📞 How to Apply:

Visit your nearest Commercial Bank branch or apply online through the official website: 

Ensure you have the necessary documents, including identification and address verification, to facilitate a smooth application process.

🔔 Stay Informed:

Subscribe to our channel and turn on notifications to stay updated on the latest financial products and investment opportunities in Sri Lanka.

title: Central Banks and Commercial Banks Compared in One Minute
description:
You don't have to memorize the textbook definition of the term "central bank" or the textbook definition of the term "commercial bank" to understand what they are, the best approach (in my opinion) is comparing them to one another.

By understanding the similarities as well as differences between central banks and commercial banks, you'll learn a thing or two about how the financial system works. If you want to find out what a central bank is, what a commercial bank is and what the similarities as well as differences between central banks and commercial banks are, watch this video.

Please like, comment and subscribe if you've enjoyed it.

title: How Commercial Banks Make Money (Explained)
description:
Commercial banks play a crucial role in the economy by accepting deposits and providing loans to individuals and businesses. This video breaks down how banks make money through interest income and fees, the types of loans they offer, and the services they provide, such as credit creation and agency functions. Learn how commercial banks are regulated, their core functions, and why their operations are vital to economic growth.

Learn more about this topic: https://corporatefinanceinstitute.com/resources/knowledge/finance/commercial-bank/

Chapters:
00:00 - Introduction
00:15 - How Commercial Banks Make Money
00:50 - Functions of Commercial Banks
01:34 - Types of Loans Offered
02:11 - Regulation by Central Banks

#CommercialBank #Banking

Investment Bank vs. Commercial Bank: Differences Explained
description:
The key differences between Investment Banking and Commercial Banking (Retail Banking). I explain how investment banks and commercial banks make money, the different types of clients, services, and regulations. I also mention Universal Banks, and how they have an increasing role in the banking industry.

Most of us know what a commercial bank is. Yet few of us understand what an investment bank is. So in this video, I break down the key differences between both and share an insider perspective from my time working in Investment Banking at Goldman Sachs in NYC.

title: What is Commercial Banking (Businesses)
description:
📊 Understanding Business Commercial Banking: A Complete Guide

Welcome to our deep dive into the world of business commercial banking! In this video, we break down the essential services banks provide to businesses, focusing on how they support financial growth, streamline operations, and enhance cash flow management. Whether you're a small business owner, a finance professional, or simply curious about how business banking works, this guide will give you the clarity you need.

📌 Chapters Overview:
1️⃣ Lending

Discover how commercial lending works and why it's critical for businesses looking to expand or meet short-term financial needs.
Learn about lines of credit, a flexible funding option for managing cash flow.
We also discuss interest rates and how they affect borrowing costs, as well as the importance of collateral in securing loans.
2️⃣ Current Accounts

Explore the different types of current accounts available for businesses, including their unique features and benefits.
Understand how choosing the right account can simplify transactions and improve day-to-day financial management.
3️⃣ Payments and Transaction Services

Dive into the tools that help businesses handle financial transactions efficiently.
Learn about payroll services that ensure your employees are paid accurately and on time.
Discover the benefits of payment processing systems that allow businesses to accept credit cards and digital payments seamlessly.
Get insights into merchant services designed to support your point-of-sale and online payment needs.

💼 Why This Video Matters:
Whether you're starting a new business or looking to optimize your existing financial operations, understanding the key aspects of commercial banking can save you time, money, and stress. This video will empower you with the knowledge to make informed decisions about the banking services that suit your business best.

📚 Resources and Tools Mentioned:
Check the links in the description for additional resources, helpful articles, and tools to help you explore your business banking options further.

🌟 Subscribe for More:
If you found this video helpful, don’t forget to like, comment, and subscribe for more insights into business, finance, and banking. Share this video with fellow business owners who could benefit from these valuable tips!

🔔 Turn on notifications so you never miss an update from our channel.

📣 Got questions or topics you'd like us to cover in future videos? Drop them in the comments below, and we’ll be happy to dive into them!

#BusinessBanking #CommercialBanking #FinancialTips #BusinessFinance #BankingForBusinesses

title: Commercial Banking in India | Meaning, Structure, Types, Functions & Importance of Commercial Banks
description:
Commercial banking plays an important role in the economic development of any country. A commercial bank is a financial institution which performs the functions of accepting deposits from the general public and giving loans for investment with the aim of earning profit. The objective of these banks is to make profits.

In this video, we will cover the following topics:

Meaning of Commercial Bank
Role of Banks in Indian Economy
Structure of Banking in India
Importance of Commercial Bank
Types of Commercial Bank
Functions of Commercial Bank

Read Commercial Banking in India at https://papertyari.com/finance/commercial-banking-in-india/

title: How Commercial Banks Really Create Money (the Money Multiplier is a MYTH).
description:
Want to help me do more research? Consider supporting via: https://www.patreon.com/moneymacro or https://ko-fi.com/moneymacro

△ Or for one-time donations: 
https://www.paypal.com/donate?hosted_button_id=LTE3H3FUND37Y


This video explains why fractional reserve banking and the money multiplier theory are myths and how banks do, in fact, create money.

△ Want to know more about money creation? Check out the playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLGbVoSdwvesDGhm9l5eVWCmRkpYDGu5NS
△ Want to know more about central banking? Check out the playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list...​
△ Check out how I use these principles to study country economies: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list...

Yes, banks create money (through credit creation) but they do not do so by getting cash from you and then lending over and over till they reach the reserve requirement limit, as the money multiplier theory suggests. The reserve requirement is not a hard limit on money creation because central banks create new reserves to support healthy but cash strained banks. This is evident since, even though banks can technically ‘create money’, they can still fail because they do have to pay back that money. There are three other important soft limits on bank money creation. These are the public’s demand for debt, capital requirements, and liquidity concerns. 

For a more in depth blog on this topic check out: http://www.moneymacro.rocks/2020-02-26-banks-make-money/

Narrated and produced by Dr. Joeri Schasfoort (University of Cape Town)
https://twitter.com/joerischasfoort
https://www.linkedin.com/in/joeri-schasfoort/

If you would like to go even more in depth. I suggest these excellent books:

- Where Does Money Come From?, excellent introduction on where money comes from by some of the leading forces behind the positive money movement.
- The end of alchemy, excellent book written by the former governor of the Bank of England: Mervyn King;
- Debt: The First 5,000 Years, historical account of debt as money;
- The New Paradigm in Macroeconomics: Solving the Riddle of Japanese Macroeconomic Performance, interesting account on how bank money creation powered the Japanese economic miracle;
- Modern Money Theory: A Primer on Macroeconomics for Sovereign Monetary Systems, introduction to the popular Modern Money Theory (MMT), a macroeconomic school of thought with bank money creation at the heart of it.

For some of the footage used in this video, I make the following attributions: 

- Wallstreet cc Vedevo
- NYC Times Square cc Vedevo
- City at night cc Vedevo
- Dollar printing cc Panning Vedevo
- Hong Kong street level cc Vedevo
- Banks in the clouds cc Pexels
- ECB construction video cc ECB
- Deutsche Bundesbank video cc Deutsche Bundesbank
